subject: BENGL

notes.descrlong: Course includes students from Yale University via video-conference.
Course includes students from Yale University via video-conference.

description: For beginners, provides a thorough grounding in conversational, reading, and writing skills.

subject: BENGL

notes.descrlong: Prerequisite: BENGL 1102 or examination. Course includes students from Yale University via video-conference. Permission of instructor required.

description: Continuing focus on reading, writing, and conversational skills, this course is designed to advance students' oral competence and enhance comprehension skills through reading, conversations, and listening.

subject: BENGL

notes.descrlong: Prerequisite: BENGL 2202 or permission of instructor. Will be taught as a video-conference course with Columbia University.

description: Continuing instruction in Bengali at the advanced level focusing on conversation, interview, and discussion skills.

notes.descrlong: By placement of instructor.

description: To enable Heritage students to read Bengali stories and write short essays.

subject: BENGL

notes.descrlong: This course is designed for students who have had 1 year's coursework in Bengali & can talk, understand, write & read primers & want an introduction to Bengali focusing on extensive use of the written & spoken language. Video-conference with Yale University.

description: Continuing focus on reading, writing, and conversational skills, this course is designed to advance students' oral competence and enhance comprehension skills through reading, conversations, and listening.

notes.descrlong: Course includes students from Yale University via video-conference.

description: Intended for beginners or students placed by examination. The emphasis is on basic grammar, speaking, and comprehension skills; Bengali script will also be introduced.

subject: BENGL

subject: BENGL

notes.descrlong: Prerequisite: Intermediate level proficiency in language and permission of instructor.

description: Gives comprehensive training in oral and written Bengali at a higher level than BENGL 2201/ BENGL 2202.Â  Oral training covers reading and conversational Bengali expressions on daily life, topics with discussions, and offering opinions as global tasks. Written training includes reviews of current affairs. Â

notes.descrlong: Prerequisite: BENGL 1121. This course is part of the Shared Course Initiative and will include students from Yale University using videoconferencing technology.
